scripts.build:cv: cd src/content/cv && pandoc cv.md --pdf-engine=weasyprint --css=../../styles/cv.css -o ../../../public/cv-stschwartz-$(date +%Y%m%d).pdf && pandoc cv.md --css=../../styles/cv.css --embed-resources --standalone -t html5 -o ../../../public/cv.html || echo 'PDF generation failed, continuing build...'
